attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For traditional academic subjects (Mathematics, English etc)allowing A level and higher students the option to be assessed either by 100% exam mark or by 100% coursework mark rather than a mixture of the 2 would allow for students to maximise their chances of obtaining good grades and relieve some of the stresses associated with current assessment schemes.

Additionally instituting an improved apprenticeship scheme for those who are not academically minded, thus allowing the skills of the nation to be trained to a good level in both academic and practical persuits.
